Reviews.Title: Plus outweighs minus
Reviews.Author: dlocdloc
Reviews.Content: The small diameter of the imager/snake and the long length make this far more useful than a 3' video snake. The down side is the package is far more cumbersome and the snake can't be stored in the case. Rated as waterproof but would like to know how deep. Have used it to route wires in a 9 foot wall (top and bottom plates with one set-up), look at critters in animal dens, examine drain tile for sediment build-up and find an antifreeze leak above a skid plate in the middle of a vehicle.

Reviews.Title: Good tool for multiple purposes.
Reviews.Author: Retired in Atlanta "Jim"
Reviews.Content: First use was to look into a covered outlet box that seemed to have no use.  Found a wiring hole that was not used.  Plan to run audio cable using the hole.  Tool will make it easier to get the wire through the hole into the basement.

Reviews.Title: inspection snake
Reviews.Author: HiltonK
Reviews.Content: This snake is a good tool for the price.  It would be better id the lens had an adjustable focus. The camera does work well however.

Reviews.Title: Poor Lens
Reviews.Author: DanKau
Reviews.Content: This long 16 ft Works if the place that you try to look at is not ruff or will scratch the tip of the len then it will get blur not seeing anything after that one try. Just don't scratch the plastic lens.

Reviews.Title: Great Wireless Inspection Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Junior Pampin
Reviews.Content: One of the best Wireless Inspection Camera systems I have seen out in the market. I have done an unboxing from this seller and have made 2 other videos on possible battery/DC wall outlet mod and a mod to protect the camera head.Thanks!![...]  Unboxing[...]  Battery Mod[...]  Camera head Mod
